title: After Success at Unbound, Should Other Races Implement Staggered Starts for Women? We Asked the Pros.
content:
Many women feel that a new standard has been set and other race organizers need to adapt accordingly.

Read the full article at After Success at Unbound, Should Other Races Implement Staggered Starts for Women? We Asked the Pros. on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
